mapper.insert: insert into j_bonus_fhj (id, u_id, amount, balance, status, create_time) values (null, #{uId}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{status}, now())
mapper.select:
select '分红奖' as name,amount,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') create_time from j_bonus_fhj
and u_id = #{uId} and status = 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
order by create_time desc
select u_id,sum(amount) as amount from j_bonus_fhj where status = 1 and to_days(now()) = to_days(create_time) group by u_id
